 2013-14002013-12-12CIC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) protect the integrity of the Canadian labour market by providing enhanced authority to verify employer compliance with Temporary Foreign Worker Program requirements, including efforts to hire Canadians and apply a consequence for non-compliance; and (2) protect Temporary Foreign Workers from abuse, including physical, sexual, psychological and financial abuse.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0245 Publication Date: 2014-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
